titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit borrowers to use the same collateral to secure two or more direct or guaranteed real estate loans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Credit.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit a borrower to use the same collateral to secure two or more direct or guaranteed Farmers Home Administration real estate loans. Stipulates that outstanding loan debt may not exceed total collateral value.
